mapper.update:
update diet_element
goal_type = #{goalType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goal_id = #{goalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENERGY = #{energy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROTEIN = #{protein,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAT = #{fat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARBOHYDRATE = #{carbohydrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DF = #{df,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Ca = #{ca,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Fe = #{fe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Zn = #{zn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Se = #{se,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Cu = #{cu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Mn = #{mn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Mg = #{mg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Na = #{na,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
K = #{k,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P = #{p,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VITA = #{vita,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VITE = #{vite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VITB1 = #{vitb1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VITB2 = #{vitb2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VITC = #{vitc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VITPP = #{vitpp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASP = #{asp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WATER = #{water,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VPP = #{vpp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
I = #{i,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURINE = #{purine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where element_id = #{elementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update diet_element set goal_type = #{goalType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goal_id = #{goalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPARTMENT = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENERGY = #{energy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROTEIN = #{protein,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAT = #{fat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARBOHYDRATE = #{carbohydrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DF = #{df,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ca = #{ca,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Fe = #{fe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Zn = #{zn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Se = #{se,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Cu = #{cu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Mn = #{mn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Mg = #{mg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Na = #{na,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, K = #{k,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P = #{p,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VITA = #{vita,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VITE = #{vite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VITB1 = #{vitb1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VITB2 = #{vitb2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VITC = #{vitc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VITPP = #{vitpp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASP = #{asp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WATER = #{water,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VPP = #{vpp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, I = #{i,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURINE = #{purine,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where element_id = #{elementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
